

A function to plot a variable against the shanon index.





```{r, include=FALSE}
data_5130 <- read.csv("data/data_5130.csv")
```



```{r, include=FALSE}
gradiant_plot <- function(index, variable) {
library(tidyverse)
missing = (variable != "mv") 

index <- index[missing]
variable <- variable[missing]

variable <-  as.numeric(variable)
ggplot(mapping = aes(x = index, y = variable)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE)
}
```

```{r}
gradiant_plot(data_5130$shanon_index_v2, data_5130$pHjord)
```
